itemDisplayName: Deploy a 5 Node Service Fabric Cluster and an OMS workspace
description: This template allows you to deploy a 5 node Service fabric Cluster running Windows server 2012 R2 Datacenter, an OMS Workspace, and add the diagnostic storage account to the workspace and enable the Service Fabric Gallery solution together with the VMSS instances
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys Service Fabric Cluster into OMS and enables monitoring on the VMSS
